li.a: III. Events leading to membership of italy and the Federal Republic of Germany in the Brussels Treaty Organization, to membership of the Federal Republic of Germany in the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, and to the restoration of sovereignty to the Federal Republic of Germany:

A. Reaction to the French rejection of the European Defense Community Treaty: Foreign Secretary Eden’s trip to Brussels, Bonn, Paris, and Rome, September 11–15, 1954; Secretary of State Dulles’ trip to Bonn and London, September 16–17, 1954; development of United States policy toward Europe in light of the French rejection of the EDC Treaty (NSC 5433); and preparations for the Nine-Power and Four-Power Conferences (Documents 1–102)
